snippet: Anthony Davis has a left ankle sprain that must be evaluated later this week before he can be cleared to practice with the United States Olympic team.
abstract: New Orleans Hornets rookie Anthony Davis must be evaluated for his ankle sprain before being cleared to practice with the US Olympic team.
lead_paragraph: Anthony Davis has a left ankle sprain that must be evaluated later this week before he can be cleared to practice with the United States Olympic team.

headline.seo: Anthony Davis Sprains Ankle and Awaits Evaluation
headline.main: Anthony Davis Sprains Ankle and Awaits Evaluation
